chunks.title: Yuvraj Mehta ‚Äî Overview
chunks.text: I am Yuvraj Mehta, a Full Stack Developer. I am a B.Tech Computer Science student at NIT Patna and currently based in Patna, India.

chunks.title: Yuvraj Mehta ‚Äî Contact & Availability
chunks.text: I can be contacted via email at yuvraj.mehta532@gmail.com and phone at +91-9334083113. I am currently Available and prefer Remote, Hybrid, Onsite work modes. I operate in the IST (UTC +5:30) timezone.

chunks.title: Yuvraj Mehta ‚Äî Social & Coding Profiles
chunks.text: I maintain active profiles across platforms such as GitHub, LinkedIn, LeetCode, CodeChef, Codeforces, GeeksForGeeks, Twitter, and Instagram.

chunks.title: Yuvraj Mehta ‚Äî Bio (intro)
chunks.text: B.Tech CS student at NIT Patna passionate about building full stack applications with a focus on user-friendly interfaces. Skilled in MERN Stack.

chunks.title: Yuvraj Mehta ‚Äî Bio (full)
chunks.text: Computer Science student at NIT Patna passionate about full stack development with a strong foundation in Data Structures & Algorithms. I approach technical challenges analytically and continually expand my skills in GenAI and modern web technologies. As a Robotics Club member, I've organized workshops and led teams building combat and soccer bots. Outside coding, I enjoy competitive programming and sports, having won Bronze in 50m Hurdles at NIT Patna Intramurals.

chunks.title: Yuvraj Mehta ‚Äî Bio (robotics)
chunks.text: As a Robotics Club member, I've organized workshops and led teams building combat and soccer bots. I believe in learning by doing and enjoy sharing knowledge with others through mentoring and technical discussions.

chunks.title: Yuvraj Mehta ‚Äî Bio (interests)
chunks.text: When I'm not coding, you can find me solving algorithmic challenges on competitive programming platforms, participating in hackathons, or running track. I won Bronze in 50m Hurdles at NIT Patna Intramurals!

chunks.text: I am seeking Internship and Full-Time roles such as Software Engineer, Full Stack Developer, Backend Developer in domains including Web Development, Backend Systems, Distributed Systems, Generative AI.

chunks.text: I earned the Winner - Model United Nations in 2023. Represented the Republic of Poland at NIT Patna's Model United Nations. Earned the Best Delegate award for exceptional debate skills and impactful resolutions.

chunks.title: Technical Member at Robotics Club, NIT Patna
chunks.text: As a Technical Member at Robotics Club, NIT Patna, I Organized and facilitated 3+ workshops on designing and building robotic bots. Led a team of 4 to build a combat-ready battle bot, achieving 4th place among 15+ teams at NIT Patna's tech fest. Directed a team of 3 in designing and developing a soccer bot for the annual tech fest, enhancing hands-on robotics and teamwork skills.

chunks.title: Class Representative at Computer Science Department, NIT Patna
chunks.text: As a Class Representative at Computer Science Department, NIT Patna, I Served as the official representative for the Computer Science Engineering department for 3 consecutive semesters. Coordinated communication between faculty and students, organized department events and academic activities. Facilitated student concerns and feedback to administration, contributing to improved academic environment and student satisfaction.

chunks.title: Team Leader at Hackathons (including Smart India Hackathon)
chunks.text: As a Team Leader at Hackathons (including Smart India Hackathon), I Led teams in 4 major hackathons, including the prestigious Smart India Hackathon. Guided my team to qualify at the internal NIT Patna hackathon and advance to the national level. Oversaw all phases from ideation to development and presentation, ensuring effective collaboration and timely delivery of innovative solutions.

chunks.title: BookHive ‚Äî Live
chunks.text: I built BookHive, a full-stack library management system with distinct user and admin roles. It features book and PYQ management, a borrowing system, OTP-verified authentication, and separate dashboards. Built with React, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.. I used React, Redux Toolkit, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, JWT to implement features such as Full-stack library management system, User and admin role management, Book and PYQ management, OTP-verified authentication, Separate user and admin dashboards.

chunks.title: Portfolio Website ‚Äî Live
chunks.text: I built Portfolio Website, Personal developer portfolio showcasing projects and skills. Designed and built a responsive single-page portfolio with smooth animations and dynamic navigation. Integrated a contact form using EmailJS and added a downloadable resume feature.. I used React, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Vite to implement features such as Responsive single-page portfolio, Smooth animations and dynamic navigation, Integrated contact form with EmailJS, Downloadable resume feature.

chunks.title: EcoGuardian ‚Äî Live
chunks.text: I built EcoGuardian, An online community platform empowering individuals to collaborate on environmental projects, report cleanliness issues, access educational resources, and drive positive change for a cleaner, greener future. üåç. I used HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, Express, MongoDB to implement features such as Environmental community platform, Project collaboration features, Cleanliness issue reporting, Educational resources access.

chunks.title: Stickify ‚Äî Live
chunks.text: I built Stickify, This is a simple notes application built with React and Vite. It allows users to create, update, delete, and manage notes with different colors. The application uses Appwrite as the backend service for managing notes.. I used React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Appwrite to implement features such as Simple notes application, Create, update, delete notes, Color-coded note organization, Appwrite backend integration.
